title: xin zhao buffs on pbe

embed.description: Previous PBE Cycles in 2016 Below you will find a comprehensive list of new content, balance changes, and whatever else is included in the current PBE cycle! Be aware that these changes are extremely tentative, there is a possibility that things you see below will be changed or even reverted prior to the live patch.

body:
Xin Zhao
Base health increased to 600 from 591.16
Health growth increased to 95 from 87

I remember asking for this buff YEARS ago. I've always thought it weird that xin had such shitty base health for a pure melee champion.

This change won't make him a competitive pick, but as its a strict buff to his tankiness it will probably help the zhao man. I mean, he's still gonna have the ~42% winrate top in plat+, but maybe his jungle will hit 50%? Who knows.

EDIT: They already nerfed it on pbe from 95 to 92, feelsbadman.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BQAxjXFy,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-08T16:34:13.986+0000)
>
> What abilities scale for AP Xin?

His W and his E both scale with AP. The idea is to heal so fast they can't kill you. It is a super sustain build, you can heal so fast by auto attacking that towers can't kill you as long as you keep hitting them. He is weak though, if for any reason you stop auto attacking, you will die super easy. He has to be played right but if done well, he can carry super easy.

I take tele/smite so I can solo rush a tower in an empty lane, then hide and tele to another lane as the enemy team rushes to stop the first lane from being pushed. Take another tower in another lane, then solo baron or maybe reverse order, depending on what the enemy team is up to. Map awareness is helpful.

Back before he was nerfed I could auto attack the enemy tank so fast my life would drop to 100 or below, while their damage dealers tried to kill me, then spike back to full, over and over and over.
